job_details.job_description:
We are looking for a Data Scientist to develop analytical models and insights from complex datasets.
Our Data Scientists research and develop statistical models, machine learning algorithms, and data-driven solutions to business problems. This role involves working with large datasets, developing predictive models, and communicating insights to stakeholders.

What You'll Do

- Develop and implement statistical models and machine learning algorithms
- Analyze large datasets to identify patterns and trends
- Create data visualizations and reports for stakeholders
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define business problems
- Evaluate model performance and iterate on solutions
- Present findings and recommendations to technical and non-technical audiences

What We're Looking For

- 3+ years of experience in data science or related field
- Proficiency in Python, R, or similar programming languages
- Experience with statistical analysis and machine learning
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
- Excellent communication and presentation skills

Nice To Have

- Advanced degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Computer Science, or related field
- Experience with big data technologies (Spark, Hadoop)
- Knowledge of deep learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch)
- Experience with A/B testing and experimental design

Proficiency in Python, R, or similar programming languages
Experience with statistical analysis and machine learning

interview_round_1.objective: Assess the candidate's motivations, career goals, and work preferences while providing clarity on the role and company expectations.

topic_info.name: Introduction & Role Fit
topic_info.description: Covers the interview structure, their alignment with the role and motivation and career aspirations.

interview_round_2.objective: Evaluate the candidate's ability to solve practical data science challenges, assess their problem-solving approach, and conduct a deep dive into their technical reasoning.

subtopics.name: Statistical Analysis

activity_details.activity_description: Analyze a dataset and provide insights using statistical methods and visualization.
activity_details.activity_instructions: You will be given a dataset and asked to perform exploratory data analysis, identify patterns, and present your findings.

data.character_background: Sarah is a senior data scientist with 8 years of experience in developing predictive models and statistical analysis. She has worked across various industries including finance, healthcare, and e-commerce.
data.character_personality: Analytical, detail-oriented, and collaborative. Sarah values clear communication and enjoys mentoring junior team members.

data.character_background: Michael leads the data science team and has extensive experience in translating business problems into analytical solutions. He has a strong background in both technical and business aspects of data science.
data.character_personality: Strategic, results-driven, and supportive. Michael focuses on business impact and team development.
